Once there was a count's daughter
whose lands were beset by fiends,
causing her to lose family and home.
Finally, she fled to a nearby territory
ruled by a friend of her father.

context.zh_cn:
那个女孩是伯爵的女儿。
魔兽的侵袭夺走了她的双亲。
父母帮着女孩从着火的城堡逃走。
女孩翻山越岭，
去寻找统治邻近领地的父亲的朋友。
context.zh_tw:
女孩原是某位伯爵的掌上明珠。
因魔獸的侵襲而奪走了她的雙親，

為了投靠治理鄰近領地的父親友人，
女孩翻山越嶺前往目的地。

context.en_us:
She walked for days upon end, until
darkness and exhaustion threatened
to claim her. But just then, she saw
an old empty castle in the distance,
and was able to slip through its gate.

今晚就在那里过夜吧。
女孩踏入了城堡。

context.en_us:
As she entered the empty great hall,
a chill ran down her spine—for it was
lined with taxidermied humans!
Then, five words echoed out in
the hall: ＂Do you like my friends?＂

context.zh_cn:
进入毫无生气的大厅，
令女孩毛骨悚然。
那里竟陈列着人的标本！
“如何，这些都是我的朋友。”
有谁在黑暗中说道。
context.zh_tw:
女孩走進毫無生氣的大廳，
讓她毛骨悚然背脊發涼。
陳列在眼前的竟是人類的標本！？
「如何，他們都是我的朋友喔。」
黑暗之中，有人說話了。

context.en_us:
The inhuman voice terrified the girl,
but she found the strength to reply.
＂I needed a shelter from the night,＂
she said. ＂Pray forgive my intrusion.＂

それは<ruby><rb>人</rb><rt>ひと</rt></ruby>に<ruby><rb>似</rb><rt>に</rt></ruby>たなにかだった。
<ruby><rb>娘</rb><rt>むすめ</rt></ruby>は<ruby><rb>恐怖</rb><rt>きょうふ</rt></ruby>におびえながら、<ruby><rb>口</rb><rt>くち</rt></ruby>にした。

context.zh_cn:

有屋檐的地方睡觉。

＂Eee hee hee!＂ laughed the voice.
＂I am not mad at you, dear girl.
In fact, I was just wishing I had one
such as you I could call my friend.＂

「キャハ♪　<ruby><rb>怒</rb><rt>おこ</rt></ruby>ってなんてないわ」

「呀哈♪我怎麼會生氣呢。」

context.en_us:
＂For it is dark in here, and ever so
lonely—but I would not be lonely
if I had more friends. Will you not

「ここは<ruby><rb>暗</rb><rt>くら</rt></ruby>くて、さみしいの。

context.en_us:
＂I would be happy to be your friend,＂
responded the girl in a trembling
voice. ＂But not like the others who

context.ja_jp:
「お<ruby><rb>友達</rb><rt>ともだち</rt></ruby>ならいくらでも。

<ruby><rb>娘</rb><rt>むすめ</rt></ruby>は<ruby><rb>震</rb><rt>ふる</rt></ruby>え<ruby><rb>声</rb><rt>ごえ</rt></ruby>で<ruby><rb>答</rb><rt>こた</rt></ruby>えました。

＂I have seen your other friends,＂ said

「だったら<ruby><rb>剥製</rb><rt>はくせい</rt></ruby>だわ。それなら

＂And yet, an eternity of silence is

bone, for they gave her a sense of
how lonely immortality truly was.

And while she was not immortal,
the girl also knew the pain of loss—
for just recently had everything she
knew and loved been torn from her.

<ruby><rb>孤独</rb><rt>こどく</rt></ruby>なのは<ruby><rb>娘</rb><rt>むすめ</rt></ruby>も<ruby><rb>同</rb><rt>おな</rt></ruby>じだった。

to find a way to dispel her newfound
loneliness and start a family anew—
which was why she could not afford
to spend eternity as a mannequin.
